Class Nd4jBase64

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.nd4j.serde.base64.Nd4jBase64

  • public class Nd4jBase64
extends java.lang.Object
    NDArray as base 64

    • Method Summary

      static INDArray[] arraysFromBase64(java.lang.String base64)

      static boolean isMultiple(java.lang.String base64)
      Returns true if the base64 contains multiple arrays This is delimited by tab
